experiments.title: Volcano Chemical Reaction
experiments.aim: To demonstrate a chemical reaction using a volcano model.
experiments.theory: Some chemical reactions release energy in the form of heat and gas, known as exothermic reactions.
procedure: Understand how gas formation causes eruption.
Relate it to baking soda and vinegar reaction.
experiments.result: Exothermic reactions are understood through visualization.

experiments.title: Condenser
experiments.aim: To study the working of a condenser.
experiments.theory: A condenser cools vapour and converts it into liquid during distillation.
experiments.observation: Cooling tubes and flow path are visible.
experiments.result: The working of a condenser is understood.
